texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My play/pause button mysteriously stopped working in iTunes and VLC mysteriously this week on my laptop. It affected the previous track and next track buttons as well. It turns out that my Google Music extension in Chrome stole the keyboard bindings after the extension updated this week.
texts.text: My play/pause button mysteriously stopped working in iTunes and VLC mysteriously this week on my laptop. It affected the previous track and next track buttons as well. It turns out that my Google Music extension in Chrome stole the keyboard bindings after the extension updated this week.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If your buttons stopped working as well, follow these steps to check your keyboard shortcuts in Chrome:
texts.text: If your buttons stopped working as well, follow these steps to check your keyboard shortcuts in Chrome:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Scroll all the way to the bottom of the page
texts.text: Scroll all the way to the bottom of the page

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Look at the key bindings in the
texts.text: Look at the key bindings in the

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Your shortcuts might look like the ones shown here in an  Apple support forum . Click each box with the X to clear each key binding or click on the key binding box itself to bind it to another key combination. If you do that, it should end up like this:
texts.text: Your shortcuts might look like the ones shown here in an  Apple support forum . Click each box with the X to clear each key binding or click on the key binding box itself to bind it to another key combination. If you do that, it should end up like this:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You also have the options of switching the shortcuts to only work within Chrome by using the drop down menus to the right of the key binding boxes.
texts.text: You also have the options of switching the shortcuts to only work within Chrome by using the drop down menus to the right of the key binding boxes.
